shoes.name: Nike Air Max 270
shoes.description: The Nike Air Max 270 features a bold design with a large, visible Air Max unit in the heel for a smooth, cushioned ride. The breathable mesh upper provides comfort and support.

shoes.name: Nike Air Force 1
shoes.description: The Nike Air Force 1 is a classic with a timeless silhouette. This shoe features a leather upper and Air-Sole cushioning for comfort and support.

shoes.name: Nike ZoomX Vaporfly NEXT% 2
shoes.description: The Nike ZoomX Vaporfly NEXT% 2 is built for speed with a lightweight, breathable upper and a full-length carbon fiber plate for a propulsive feel.

shoes.name: Nike SB Dunk Low
shoes.description: The Nike SB Dunk Low features a durable leather upper with a padded collar for comfort. Its classic design includes perforations for breathability and a rubber outsole for traction.

shoes.name: Nike React Infinity Run Flyknit
shoes.description: The Nike React Infinity Run Flyknit offers a soft, cushioned ride with its React foam midsole and a Flyknit upper that adapts to your footâ€™s movement.

shoes.name: Nike Air Max 97
shoes.description: The Nike Air Max 97 features a full-length Max Air unit for cushioned comfort and a sleek, reflective design that stands out.

shoes.name: Nike Air Zoom Pegasus 38
shoes.description: The Nike Air Zoom Pegasus 38 is a reliable running shoe with responsive Zoom Air cushioning and a breathable mesh upper.

shoes.name: Nike Air Max 2090
shoes.description: The Nike Air Max 2090 combines modern style with the iconic Air Max cushioning for a comfortable, futuristic look.

shoes.name: Nike Air Max Pre-Day
shoes.description: The Nike Air Max Pre-Day offers a retro-inspired design with a sleek, layered upper and visible Air cushioning for added comfort.

shoes.name: Nike Air Max Tailwind IV
shoes.description: The Nike Air Max Tailwind IV features a bold, retro design with large Air Max units and a durable mesh and leather upper.

shoes.name: Nike Air Huarache
shoes.description: The Nike Air Huarache provides a snug fit with its neoprene bootie and offers cushioned comfort with its Air-Sole unit.

shoes.name: Nike SB Dunk High
shoes.description: The Nike SB Dunk High features a high-top design with premium materials and a padded collar for added support and style.

shoes.name: Nike Air Max 1
shoes.description: The Nike Air Max 1 is known for its classic design and visible Air cushioning, combining style with all-day comfort.

shoes.name: Nike Air Zoom Alphafly NEXT%
shoes.description: The Nike Air Zoom Alphafly NEXT% is engineered for speed with a carbon fiber plate and Zoom Air pods for maximum energy return.
